file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 23-34-03-04 - CONFIG-1 - PRA UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PRA UNIT - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install PRA unit model PBS600. B. The PRA unit is installed in the forward galley, zone 232. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY AIRCRAFT WITH PRA SYSTEM MODEL 23-34-03-000-801-A PRA UNIT - REMOVAL PBS600 AIRCRAFT WITH PRA SYSTEM MODEL 23-34-03-400-801-A PRA UNIT - INSTALLATION PBS600 EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 23-34-03 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-34-03-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH PRA SYSTEM MODEL PBS600 2. PRA UNIT - REMOVAL A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to remove PRA unit model PBS600. B. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially To remove the PRA unit from the forward 3/32 Allen wrench available galley E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley H. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open these circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to them: • PRA. • PA. I. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Release the screws (5). (2) Carefully remove the panel (4). (3) With an Allen wrench, remove the screws (3). (4) Carefully pull the PRA unit (2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-34-03 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (5) Disconnect the electrical connector (1). (6) Remove the PRA unit (2) from the forward galley. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-34-03 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH PRA SYSTEM MODEL PBS600 PRA Unit - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B A ZONE 232 FORWARD GALLEY (REF.) DET. A 1. ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR 2. PRA UNIT 3. SCREW (4) 4. PANEL 5. SCREW (4) 145AMM230231.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-34-03 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details. MESSAGE MESSAGE LANGUAGE Pretakeoff Takeoff Seatbelt On VOLUME Seatbelt Off Terminating Fli Intermediate F1 SELECT CHINESE ENGLISH FRENCH ITALIAN SB/OFF PLAY/PAUSE CUED PWR PBS600

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 23-34-03-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT WITH PRA SYSTEM MODEL PBS600 3. PRA UNIT - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This procedure gives the instructions to install PRA unit model PBS600. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 23-34-00-700-801-A/500 PRA SYSTEM - OPERATIONAL TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 232 Forward galley D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially 3/32 Allen wrench To install the PRA unit in forward galley available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Forward galley I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Connect the electrical connector (1) to the PRA unit (2). (2) Put the PRA unit (2) into the forward galley. (3) With an Allen wrench, install the screws (3). (4) Put the panel (4) in its installation position. (5) Tighten the screws (5). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-34-03 Page 5 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close these circuit breakers and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from them: • PRA. • PA. (2) Do the PRA unit model PBS600 Operational Test ( AMM TASK 23-34-00-700-801-A/ 500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 CONFIG-1 23-34-03 Page 6 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
